marineWildlife.title: Marine Wildlife
marineWildlife.description: Sri Lanka's coastal waters reveal a captivating underwater world, teeming with colorful coral gardens and a variety of marine creatures, making it a haven for underwater enthusiasts.
points: Vibrant Coral Gardens: Explore Sri Lanka's underwater beauty in thriving coral ecosystems.
Enigmatic Dugongs: Encounter rare marine life, including the elusive dugongs.

floraAndFauna.title: Flora and Fauna
floraAndFauna.description: Nestled in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is a biodiversity hotspot, showcasing a remarkable range of plant and animal life.
points: Unique flora and fauna exclusive to Sri Lanka, including rare orchids to the giant squirrel.
Explore the rich biodiversity in national parks like Yala and Wilpattu, witnessing diverse species in their natural habitats.

avianLife.title: Avian Life
avianLife.description: Sri Lanka's vibrant avian life adds a symphony of colors and melodies to its diverse landscapes.
points: Endemic Wonders: Explore Sri Lanka's unique avian biodiversity, featuring numerous endemic species found nowhere else on Earth.
Protected Habitats: Efforts in conservation ensure the preservation of crucial bird habitats, contributing to the sustainability of Sri Lanka's avian ecosystems.
